PreceptDef.label: cattle centered
PreceptDef.description:
The heart of a ranch beats in time with the herd. Cattle are more than livestock; they are the lifeblood of the community.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - "Cattle" is defined as any animal that is milkable, plus muffalo and bison. Yes, this includes modded animals. Yes, you can have a Frostbound Behemoth ranch.

thoughtStageDescriptions.li: Enclosed pen markers around (2 or more)

li.label: no cattle
li.description: We have no cattle at all! What kind of cowboys are we?

li.label: scarce cattle
li.description: Our herd is pitifully small. Without cattle, this doesn’t feel like a real ranch.

li.label: few cattle
li.description: We have too few cattle to call this a proper ranch. It feels wrong.

li.label: some cattle
li.description: It’s good to have cattle here, but the herd is far from what it could be.

li.label: lots of cattle
li.description: Our herd is growing strong. The ranch is shaping up nicely.

li.label: tons of cattle
li.description: The herd is thriving, and the ranch feels alive. This is the way ranching is meant to be.

li.label: no pen markers around
li.description: There are no pens in our colony. It's peaceful, but something feels missing.

li.label: pen marker around
li.description: We have a pen marker set up. It's a good start to raising and caring for cattle.

li.label: pen markers around
li.description: Our pens are ready, and the ranch feels complete with cattle being raised properly.
